short_summary: Centralized storage solution for Vessel Modernization Program
description: The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) requires an efficient and cost-effective centralized storage solution for Vessel Modernization Program
full_summary:
### F7049-220141: Request for Proposal for Centralized Storage Solution

#### Tender Information

*   **Tender Reference:** WS3797618817-Doc4071844494
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3797618817
*   **Publication Date:** July 5, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** August 2, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT
*   **Amendment Number:** 3
*   **Amendment Date:** July 20, 2023

#### Procurement Details

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Hélène Kobenter (SPAC/PSPC)
    *   Email: [helene.kobenter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:helene.kobenter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: Not available
*   **End User Entities:**
    *   Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)
    *   Address: 200 Kent St. Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0E6, Canada

#### Tender Description

The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) requires an industrial centralized storage solution in support of all Vessel Modernization Program (VMP) Projects. 

**Regions of Delivery:**

The tender is open to contractors located in the following regions:

*   Ontario (except National Capital Region)
*   Quebec (except National Capital Region)
*   Newfoundland and Labrador
*   Nova Scotia
*   British Columbia

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to contractors who are eligible under the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO
